text: Elam is a Meetei Manipuri surname or family name which has Indian origin. People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Elam * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Elam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Elam (surname)
